description: Data was loaded from Genotype-Tissue Expression (GTEx) Project on November 2017. Sample Attributes data was loaded using GTEx Data Portal. More details: gtexportal.org

fields.description: Subject ID, GTEx Public Donor ID
fields.name: SUBJID

fields.description: Sample ID, GTEx Public Sample ID
fields.name: SAMPID

fields.description: Autolysis Score, assigned by a pathologist during a visual inspection of the histology image. 0 to 3 (None, Mild, Moderate, and Severe)
fields.name: SMATSSCR

fields.description: Code for BSS collection site
fields.name: SMCENTER

fields.description: Pathology Notes, notes from PRC Report
fields.name: SMPTHNTS

fields.description: RIN Number: RNA Integrity Number, as measured by Agilent Bioanalyzer
fields.name: SMRIN

fields.description: Tissue Type, area from which the tissue sample was taken. This is a parent value to SMTSD
fields.name: SMTS

fields.description: Tissue Type, more specific detail of tissue type
fields.name: SMTSD

fields.description: Uberon ID, anatomical location as described by the Uber Anatomy Ontology (UBERON)
fields.name: SMUBRID

fields.description: Total Ischemic time for a sample
fields.name: SMTSISCH

fields.description: Time a sample spent in the PAXgene fixative
fields.name: SMTSPAX

fields.description: Nucleic Acid Isolation Batch ID
fields.name: SMNABTCH

fields.description: Type of nucleic acid isolation batch
fields.name: SMNABTCHT

fields.description: Date of nucleic acid isolation batch
fields.name: SMNABTCHD

fields.description: Genotype or Expression Batch ID
fields.name: SMGEBTCH

fields.description: Date of genotype or expression batch
fields.name: SMGEBTCHD

fields.description: Type of genotype or expression batch
fields.name: SMGEBTCHT

fields.description: Samples included in the GTEx Analysis Freeze
fields.name: SMAFRZE

fields.description: Name of the genotype gtc file
fields.name: SMGTC

fields.description: End 2 Mapping Rate: Number of End 2 mapped reads divided by the total number of End 1 reads
fields.name: SME2MPRT

fields.description: Chimeric Pairs: Number of reads whose mates map to different genes
fields.name: SMCHMPRS

fields.description: Intragenic Rate: The fraction of reads that map within genes (within introns or exons)
fields.name: SMNTRART

fields.description: Number of Gaps: Number of regions with �5 bases with zero coverage
fields.name: SMNUMGPS

fields.description: Mapping Rate: Ratio of total mapped reads to total reads
fields.name: SMMAPRT

fields.description: Exonic Rate: Fraction of reads that map within exons
fields.name: SMEXNCRT

fields.description: 5' 50-based normalization:  50 (this number is the value for the transcript end length parameter) refers to the definition of how many bases are considered at the end; this value is the ratio between the coverage at the 5' end and the average coverage of the full transcript, averaged over all transcripts
fields.name: SM550NRM

fields.description: Genes Detected: Total number of genes with at least 5 exon mapping reads
fields.name: SMGNSDTC

fields.description: Unique Rate of Mapped: Unique reads divided by all mapped reads
fields.name: SMUNMPRT

fields.description: 3' 50-base normalization: the ratio between the coverage at the 3' end and the average coverage of the full transcript, averaged over all transcripts
fields.name: SM350NRM

fields.description: Read Length: Maximum detected read length found
fields.name: SMRDLGTH

fields.description: Mean Coverage Per Base: Coverage is averaged per base across each transcript, and averaged again across all transcripts
fields.name: SMMNCPB

fields.description: End 1 Mismatch Rate: Number of End 1 bases not matching the reference divided by the total number of End 1 bases
fields.name: SME1MMRT

fields.description: Fragment Length StdDev: Distance between the start of an upstream read and the end of the downstream pair mate
fields.name: SMSFLGTH

fields.description: Estimated library size: Number of expected fragments based on the total reads and duplication rate assuming a Poisson distribution
fields.name: SMESTLBS

fields.description: Mapped: Total number of reads aligned/mapped
fields.name: SMMPPD

fields.description: Intergenic Rate: The fraction of reads that map to the genomic space between genes
fields.name: SMNTERRT

fields.description: RRNA: Number of all reads (duplicate and non-duplicate) aligning to ribosomal RNA regions
fields.name: SMRRNANM

fields.description: Total: Total reads (filtered to exclude reads with vendor fail or alternative alignment flags)
fields.name: SMRDTTL

fields.description: Failed Vendor QC Check: Reads having been designated as failed by the sequencer
fields.name: SMVQCFL

fields.description: Mean coefficient of variation: standard deviation in base coverage divided by mean coverage
fields.name: SMMNCV

fields.description: Transcripts Detected: Total number of transcripts with at least 5 exon mapping reads
fields.name: SMTRSCPT

fields.description: Mapped Pairs: Total number of pairs for which both ends map
fields.name: SMMPPDPR

fields.description: Cumulative Gap Length: Cumulative length of gap regions of transcript alignments
fields.name: SMCGLGTH

fields.description: Gap Percentage: Total cumulative gap length divided by the total cumulative transcript lengths
fields.name: SMGAPPCT

fields.description: Unpaired Reads: Number of reads lacking a pair mate
fields.name: SMUNPDRD

fields.description: Intronic Rate: The fraction of reads that map within introns
fields.name: SMNTRNRT

fields.description: Mapped Unique Rate of Total: Ratio of mapping of reads that were aligned and were not duplicates to total reads
fields.name: SMMPUNRT

fields.description: Expression Profiling Efficiency: Ratio of exon reads to total reads
fields.name: SMEXPEFF

fields.description: Mapped Unique: Number of reads that were aligned and did not have duplicate flags
fields.name: SMMPPDUN

fields.description: End 2 Mismatch Rate: Number of End 2 bases not matching the reference divided by the total number of End 2 bases
fields.name: SME2MMRT

fields.description: End 2 Antisense: Number of reads that were sequenced in the antisense direction
fields.name: SME2ANTI

fields.description: Alternative Aligments: duplicate read entries providing alternative coordinates
fields.name: SMALTALG

fields.description: End 2 Sense: Number of End 2 reads that were sequenced in the sense direction
fields.name: SME2SNSE

fields.description: Fragment Length Mean: The fragment length is the distance between the start of an upstream read and the end of the downstream pair mate
fields.name: SMMFLGTH

fields.description: End 1 Antisense: Number of End 1 reads that were sequenced in the antisense direction
fields.name: SME1ANTI

fields.description: Split Reads: Number of reads that span an exon-exon boundary
fields.name: SMSPLTRD

fields.description: Base Mismatch Rate: Number of bases not matching the reference divided by the total number of bases aligned
fields.name: SMBSMMRT

fields.description: End 1 Sense: Number of End 1 reads that were sequenced in the sense direction
fields.name: SME1SNSE

fields.description: End 1 % Sense: Percentage of intragenic End 1 reads that were sequenced in the sense directio
fields.name: SME1PCTS

fields.description: RRNA Rate: Ratio of all reads aligned to rRNA regions to total reads
fields.name: SMRRNART

fields.description: End 1 Mapping Rate: Number of End 1 mapped reads divided by the total number of End 1 reads
fields.name: SME1MPRT

fields.description: Number Covered 5' : The number of transcripts that have at least one read in their 5   end
fields.name: SMNUM5CD

fields.description: Duplication Rate of Mapped reads: Number of duplicate reads divided by total mapped reads
fields.name: SMDPMPRT

fields.description: End 2 % Sense: Percentage of intragenic End 2 reads that were sequenced in the sense direction
fields.name: SME2PCTS
